<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nanite Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2463) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 72 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Trigger**
You attempt a skill check requiring three actions or fewer.

</column>

---

You stimulate your nanites, forcing your body to temporarily increase its efficiency. You gain a +2 status bonus to the triggering skill check. In addition, your circuitry glows, lighting a 10-foot emanation with dim light for 1 round.

<title level="2">Nanite Surge leads to...</title>
[Consistent Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2474), [Offensive Subroutine](/Feats.aspx?ID=2472), [Protective Subroutine](/Feats.aspx?ID=2470)
name: Nanite Surge
